name: Ninja-mustache
tagline: Mustache template module for Ninja framework based on the mustache.java engine.
body: # Mustache template module for Ninja framework. Mustache (http://mustache.github.io/) can be used for HTML, config files, source code - anything. It works by expanding tags in a template using values provided in a hash or object. This is an easly plugable module for Ninja web framework to write templates using [mustache.java](https://github.com/spullara/mustache.java) engine. based on the [ninja-rythm](https://github.com/ninjaframework/ninja-rythm) module. ## Getting started 1) Add the ninja-mustache dependency to your pom.xml: org.ninjaframework ninja-mustache-module 0.1.0 2) Install the module in your conf.Module: @Override protected void configure() { ... install(new NinjaMustacheModule()); ... } 3) All set. Start writing template in 'views' folder of your application. 4) Or check out ninja-mustache-demo (in progress). Run any one of the below commands under demo: mvn jetty:run OR mvn tomcat7:run Modify code/template -- Save -- Refresh browser. Enjoy! ## Documentation https://github.com/kpacha/ninja-mustache/blob/master/documentation/user_guide.textile [![Bitdeli Badge](https://d2weczhvl823v0.cloudfront.net/kpacha/ninja-mustache/trend.png)](https://bitdeli.com/free "Bitdeli Badge")
